hotels.name: My Hotel Yerevan
hotels.description: Set in a prime location of Yerevan, My Hotel Yerevan puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, gift/souvenir shop, private check in/check out are just some of the facilities on offer. Television LCD/plasma screen, carpeting, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea, linens can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. My Hotel Yerevan is an excellent choice from which to explore Yerevan or to simply relax and rejuvenate.

sub_category_list.text: 99% found the staff to be very friendly.

summary_sentence_list.text: Great housekeeping with friendly and professional service, but mediocre reception.

summary_sentence_list.text: Good location, close to public transport.
Central location with great sightseeing, dining out and shopping.

sub_category_list.text: 70% said the wifi quality was great.

summary_sentence_list.text: Bathrooms are not great, but moderately clean.
